attributes.action: Keep face masks mandatory in shops and on public transport.
attributes.additional_details: Covid-19 cases are rising with an estimate of 100.000-200,000 cases per day once restrictions are lifted. This will see a rise in hospitalisation, deaths and long covid-19 cases. Making face masks not compulsory will leave shop, transport workers and customers at risk.
attributes.background: While covid-19 cases are on the rise keep face mask mandatory in shops and on public transport. This will keep both workers and customers safe and avoid situations of conflict.
